Digital Data Capture

Source: vignettes/forms.Rmd
forms.Rmd

This vignette provides background and transparency for the digital data capture of burn grading surveys.

Creating the data capture form

  • Design form in ODK Build
  • Include form (XML) in this package
  • Deploy form to an ODK Central server, e.g. the DBCA ODK Central server

Setting up a data capture device

  • Install ODK Collect on an Android tablet and from Admin settings > Import settings, scan the QR code shown here. This configures the tablet to the DBCA server.
  • “Get blank forms” and select the form “Burn Grading”.
  • Adjust settings to taste - auto-upload data in WiFi, reduce camera resolution.

Capture data

  • Follow the protocol on how to collect data.
  • Consult the ODK Collect user guide on how to use the app in general.
  • Nitpick: take photos in landscape orientation (turn tablet sideways), as this displays better on computer screens and in documents.

Upload data

  • Adjust ODK Collect settings to auto-upload data where WiFi is available.
  • Bring the tablets into an area with WiFi.

Contents

  • Creating the data capture form
  • Setting up a data capture device
  • Capture data
  • Upload data
